summary: We publish a strategic plan every 4 years to guide our work as we help lawmakers oversee federal operations and address the most important issues facing government and society. These Key Efforts—a component of our 2022-2027 strategic plan—detail the agency's near-term priorities to provide Congress with timely and fact-based analysis of the most important issues facing the nation. The strategic plan also includes 12 trend...
title: GAO 2022-2027 Strategic Plan: Key Efforts
